title: MoodJournal
description: A secure full-stack mood tracker built with React and Flask that lets users log daily journals, analyze emotional trends, and receive AI-powered weekly self-care insights.

title: TrackTrip
description: A cloud-based web application built with a React frontend hosted on AWS Amplify, a Flask backend deployed on Elastic Beanstalk, and a PostgreSQL database on RDS. It allows users to track and manage expenses with filtering, categorization, and interactive visual summaries to understand spending patterns.

title: Math Learning System
description: Built a Python-based solution generator and Markdown template system to deliver detailed explanations of math questions.

title: Where to Go Application
description: A travel companion app built with Java and Kotlin in Android Studio. It merges functionalities from multiple travel apps to compare weather conditions between cities. Features include user signup/login, favorite cities, customizable comparisons, and real-time weather with Google Maps SDK integration.
